title: Knife, ca. 1700–1800
markings: On blade: star small square fir tree
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Leaf-shaped blade, straight sided, plain bolster. Octagonal silver ferrule, flaring agate handle, octagonal in section, chamfered top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1700–1800.
ca. 1700–1800. steel, silver, agate. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-120.
